type IRowSeeker = interface interface IRow interface ISchematized interface ICounted interface IDisposable
public interface class IRowSeeker : IDisposable, Microsoft::ML::Runtime::Data::IRow

Docs.summary: Represents a row seeker with random access that can retrieve a specific row by the row index. For IRowSeeker, when the state is valid (that is when MoveTo() returns true), it returns the current row index. Otherwise it's -1.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveTo(int64 rowIndex) cil managed
Public Function MoveTo (rowIndex As Long) As Boolean

Docs.param: The row index to move to.
Docs.summary: Moves the seeker to a row at a specific row index. If the row index specified is out of range (less than zero or not less than the row count), it returns false and sets its Position property to -1.
Docs.returns: True if a row with specified index is found; false otherwise.
